properties.property: update batchtest1 set author=#[author], content=#[content], title=#[title], optime=#[optime], oper=#[oper], subtitle=#[subtitle], collecttime=#[collecttime],ipinfo=#[ipinfo] where name=#[name]

INSERT INTO COLLECTION_MODULE (FLOW_ID, MODULE, EXT1, EXT2, EXT3, EXT4, EXT5, EXT6, EXT7, EXT8, EXT9, EXT10, EXT11, EXT12, EXT13, EXT14, EXT15, EXT16, EXT17, EXT18, EXT19, EXT20, EXT21, EXT22, EXT23, EXT24, EXT25, EXT26, EXT27, EXT28, EXT29, EXT30) VALUES (#[FLOW_ID], #[MODULE], #[EXT1], #[EXT2], #[EXT3], #[EXT4], #[EXT5], #[EXT6], #[EXT7], #[EXT8], #[EXT9], #[EXT10], #[EXT11], #[EXT12], #[EXT13], #[EXT14], #[EXT15], #[EXT16], #[EXT17], #[EXT18], #[EXT19], #[EXT20], #[EXT21], #[EXT22], #[EXT23], #[EXT24], #[EXT25], #[EXT26], #[EXT27], #[EXT28], #[EXT29], #[EXT30] )
